Sentencas: Gadolinia-doped ceria-based films (GDC) were deposited on quartz substrates by spray pyrolysis.
Titulo: Gadolinia-doped ceria-based films deposited by spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: The films were deposited with Gd concentration of 0, 10, 20 and 30 at.%.
Titulo: Gadolinia-doped ceria-based films deposited by spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: The influence of doping concentration (Gd) and water/alcohol ratio, used as solvent in precursory solution, on structural, morphological, compositional and electrical properties of the GDC films was investigated.
Titulo: Gadolinia-doped ceria-based films deposited by spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: The analyses by X-ray diffraction showed polycrystalline films with a cubical structure of the fluorite type and preferential orientation (200).
Titulo: Gadolinia-doped ceria-based films deposited by spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: It was observed that the film growth is strongly dependent on the water/alcohol ratio used in the preparation of the precursory solution, could result in the growth of films with columnar structure.
Titulo: Gadolinia-doped ceria-based films deposited by spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: The results obtained by AFM and SEM indicated that the films are dense and free from cracks.
Titulo: Gadolinia-doped ceria-based films deposited by spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: Annealing of the films modified their level of crystallinity and crystallite size significantly.
Titulo: Gadolinia-doped ceria-based films deposited by spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: Analyses by X-ray fluorescence showed that the stoichiometry used in the precursory solution was kept in the films.
Titulo: Gadolinia-doped ceria-based films deposited by spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: Measurement of the variation of the electrical conductivity as a function of temperature showed that the doped films with 20 at.
Titulo: Gadolinia-doped ceria-based films deposited by spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: % presented higher electrical conductivity than the intrinsic films.
Titulo: Gadolinia-doped ceria-based films deposited by spray pyrolysis
